creator: mail@peneios.com

text:
Sorry, got to add something. It's actually not about adding a Method with an
Object type parameter, but not having overloaded methods ...

To have jasper work properly there should not be any parameter overloaded method
declarations. So I guess jasper works on a first match (method wise) base and
doesn't check for the param types ...

Thanks,
Chris
creator: mail@peneios.com
